Class Navigation

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      Navigation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Thread

Performs navigation commands on a separate thread, which allows for sensor monitoring to be done on the calling thread. Commands can be aborted or the calling thread can be blocked until they complete. Only one command at a time can be issued, any current command will be aborted.

THREAD SAFE
